name: phase1-main-project
description: ## DESCRIPTION This project is a client-side recipe management application designed to help users explore, curate, and enjoy a variety of culinary delights. It offers an inviting interface to view detailed recipes, toggle favorites, and discover cooking tips, all powered by a local `json-server` to simulate a backend API. This setup allows for easy testing and demonstration of front-end interactions without requiring a full server infrastructure.
